documents.content:
--- Page 1 ---
LimitX Pitch Deck Analysis for �.� Million PKR Funding
Overall Rating: �⁄��
The LimitX pitch deck presents a compelling problem and a relevant solution,
especially for the Pakistani market. The traction achieved in a short period is a
signiﬁcant strength. However, there are areas for improvement in structure, clarity,
and ﬁnancial projections to make it more investor-ready.
Good Points (Strengths)
�. Clear Problem Identiﬁcation (Slide �): The statistics on adult content

Good Points (Strengths)
�. Clear Problem Identiﬁcation (Slide �): The statistics on adult content
consumption and blocking attempts in Pakistan clearly highlight a signiﬁcant and
growing problem that LimitX addresses.
�. Relevant Solution (Slide �): The features listed (online safety, privacy-focused
browser, parental control, NSFW blocking, oﬄine functionality, device admin
protection) directly tackle the identiﬁed problem.

protection) directly tackle the identiﬁed problem.
�. Strong Traction (Slide �): Achieving �,��� users with a �.�-star rating in less than
one month without marketing is an excellent indicator of product-market ﬁt and
user satisfaction. This is a major selling point.
�. Experienced Team (Slide �): A complete team with deﬁned roles (Founder &
Lead Dev, Backend, UI/UX, DevOps & QA, Marketing) shows capability and
reduces execution risk.

Lead Dev, Backend, UI/UX, DevOps & QA, Marketing) shows capability and
reduces execution risk.
�. Clear Ask (Slide ��): The request for PKR �.� million for scaling, AI integration,
user acquisition, and global expansion is speciﬁc.
�. Market Size (Slide �): Clearly deﬁnes TAM, SAM, and SOM, indicating a large
addressable market.
Mistakes and Suggestions for Improvement
�. Introduction (Slide �): While clear, it could be more impactful. Start with the

�. Introduction (Slide �): While clear, it could be more impactful. Start with the
ʻwhy’ ‒ the emotional aspect of child safety online. Suggestion: Rephrase to
emphasize the emotional impact on parents and children, then introduce LimitX
as the solution.
--- Page 2 ---
�. Competition Analysis (Slide �): The table is hard to read due to small font size
and incomplete information. It lacks a clear ʻwhy LimitX is better’ narrative.

and incomplete information. It lacks a clear ʻwhy LimitX is better’ narrative.
Suggestion: Enlarge font, ensure all rows are ﬁlled, and add a summary
statement highlighting LimitX’s unique advantages (e.g., Pakistan-speciﬁc focus,
anti-bypass, oﬄine protection). Consider a visual representation of competitive
advantage.
�. Business Model (Slide �): The pricing structure (Free Trial, Premium
�/lifetime) is presented, but there’s no mention of

�/lifetime) is presented, but there’s no mention of
current revenue or projected revenue. The $�� earned from � users is crucial data
that should be on this slide or a dedicated ʻFinancials’ slide. Suggestion: Add
current revenue ﬁgures, projected revenue growth, and a clear path to
proﬁtability. Explain the rationale behind the pricing tiers.
�. Missing Financials/Projections: There is no dedicated slide for ﬁnancial

�. Missing Financials/Projections: There is no dedicated slide for ﬁnancial
projections, burn rate, or how the PKR �.� million will be utilized beyond broad
categories. Investors need to see a clear ﬁnancial roadmap. Suggestion: Add a
ʻFinancial Projections’ slide with �-� year forecasts (revenue, expenses,
proﬁtability) and a ʻUse of Funds’ slide detailing how the investment will be spent
and what milestones it will achieve.

and what milestones it will achieve.
�. Missing Market Validation/Testimonials: While traction is good, adding direct
quotes from users or early adopters can strengthen the narrative. Suggestion:
Consider a slide with user testimonials or a deeper dive into user engagement
metrics.
�. Visual Consistency and Design: The overall design is clean but could beneﬁt
from more visual elements (charts, icons, product screenshots) to break up text

from more visual elements (charts, icons, product screenshots) to break up text
and make it more engaging. Suggestion: Use more visuals, ensure consistent
branding, and reduce text density on some slides.
�. Call to Action/Next Steps: While ʻOur Ask’ is present, a clear call to action for the
investor (e.g., what happens after this pitch?) could be beneﬁcial. Suggestion:
Add a clear next step, e.g., “We are seeking partners who share our vision to make

Add a clear next step, e.g., “We are seeking partners who share our vision to make
the internet safer for children. Let’s discuss how we can achieve this together.”
Winning Order Pattern for Pitch Deck
Here’s a suggested order for your slides to maximize impact and address investor
concerns eﬀectively:2/month,PremiumPlus
--- Page 3 ---
�. Title Slide: LimitX - Pakistan’s First Safe Mobile Browser
�. Introduction/Hook: Start with the emotional problem (child safety online) and

�. Introduction/Hook: Start with the emotional problem (child safety online) and
introduce LimitX as the solution.
�. Problem Identiﬁcation: Deep dive into the statistics and severity of the problem
in Pakistan.
�. Solution: Clearly explain how LimitX solves the problem with its key features.
�. Product Demo/Screenshots: (New Slide) Visual representation of the app, its
interface, and key functionalities. Show, don’t just tell.

interface, and key functionalities. Show, don’t just tell.
�. Market Opportunity (TAM, SAM, SOM): Show the size and potential of the
market.
�. Traction: Highlight your impressive user growth, ratings, and early monetization.
This is your strongest point.
�. Business Model: Explain your pricing, current revenue, and how you plan to
generate more revenue.
�. Competition Analysis: Clearly show how LimitX stands out from competitors,
focusing on your unique advantages.

focusing on your unique advantages.
��. Team: Introduce your capable team and their relevant experience.
��. Financial Projections: (New Slide) �-� year revenue forecasts, key metrics, and
path to proﬁtability.
��. Use of Funds: (New Slide) Detail how the PKR �.� million will be used and what
milestones it will help achieve.
��. The Ask & Vision: Reiterate your funding request and paint a picture of the future
with LimitX.
��. Contact Information: How investors can reach you.

with LimitX.
��. Contact Information: How investors can reach you.
Final Rating: �.�⁄��
With the suggested improvements, especially in ﬁnancial clarity and visual
presentation, your pitch deck has the potential to be very strong. The core idea,
market need, and early traction are excellent. Focus on reﬁning the narrative around
your ﬁnancials and competitive edge to secure the �.� million PKR funding.
